description: Your comprehensive guide to Baldur's Gate 3 modifications, enhancing your gameplay experience with carefully curated mods.

q1.question: How do I install mods for Baldur's Gate 3?
q1.answer: Most BG3 mods can be installed using mod managers like Vortex or BG3 Mod Manager. First, download the mod file, then use the manager to install and activate it. Some mods may require manual installation - always read the mod's documentation carefully.

q2.question: Are mods compatible with multiplayer?
q2.answer: Mod compatibility in multiplayer depends on several factors. Generally, all players need to have the same mods installed in the same order. UI and visual mods are usually safer for multiplayer than gameplay-changing mods.

q3.question: Will mods disable achievements?
q3.answer: By default, using mods will disable achievements in BG3. However, there are specific mods available that can re-enable achievements while using other mods.

q4.question: What should I do if a mod causes crashes?
q4.answer: First, verify the mod's compatibility with your game version. Try disabling the mod to confirm it's the source of the crash. Check for mod conflicts, and ensure you've installed all required dependencies. If issues persist, try reinstalling the mod.

q5.question: Can I use multiple mods together?
q5.answer: Yes, but you need to be careful about compatibility. Some mods may conflict with each other, especially if they modify the same game elements. Always check mod descriptions for compatibility information and load order requirements.

q6.question: How do I update my mods?
q6.answer: Most mod managers will notify you of available updates. For manual installations, you'll need to check the mod's page regularly. Always backup your saves before updating mods, and read update notes for any special instructions.

q7.question: Will mods affect my save games?
q7.answer: Some mods can affect save games, especially those that modify gameplay mechanics or add new content. It's recommended to backup your saves before installing new mods. Removing mods mid-playthrough may corrupt save files.

q8.question: What do I do if my game won't start after installing mods?
q8.answer: Try verifying your game files through Steam/GOG, disable all mods and re-enable them one by one to identify the problematic mod. Check for mod conflicts and ensure you have all required dependencies installed.

history.title: Baldur's Gate Legacy & Modding
history.bg_content: The Baldur's Gate series has been a cornerstone of computer RPGs since 1998. The original games, developed by BioWare, set new standards for storytelling and tactical combat in video games. The series is based on Dungeons & Dragons rules and the Forgotten Realms campaign setting, featuring rich character development, complex narratives, and strategic combat systems.
history.bg3_content:
Baldur's Gate 3, developed by Larian Studios, brings the beloved franchise into modern gaming with stunning visuals, deep gameplay mechanics, and unprecedented player choice. The game features turn-based combat based on D&D 5th Edition rules, extensive character customization, multiplayer capabilities, and a rich, branching narrative. Key features include:

• Authentic D&D 5e ruleset implementation
• Dynamic, turn-based combat system
• Extensive character creation and customization
• Multi-layered storylines with meaningful choices
• Advanced graphics and physics engine
• Cross-platform multiplayer support
• Robust modding capabilities
history.modding_content:
Baldur's Gate 3's modding community has created thousands of modifications that enhance and expand the game in countless ways. From subtle tweaks to major overhauls, mods allow players to customize their experience to match their preferred playstyle. Popular mod categories include:

• Gameplay enhancements and rebalancing
• New classes, subclasses, and spells
• Character appearance options
• UI improvements and quality of life features
• Equipment and item modifications
• Custom campaigns and quests
• Performance optimizations
• Graphical enhancements
history.modding_features:
Key modding features supported by BG3 include:

• Custom content creation
• Script modifications
• UI customization
• Model and texture replacements
• Sound and music additions
• Gameplay mechanic adjustments
• New item integration
• Character customization options
history.modding_community:
The BG3 modding community continues to grow and innovate, creating new tools and resources for mod development. Notable achievements include:

• Advanced mod management tools
• Collaborative modding projects
• Documentation and tutorials
• Regular mod updates and maintenance
• Cross-mod compatibility solutions
• Performance optimization techniques
• Bug fixing and stability improvements
